name: Unfair Square - The Hardest Game
description:
Unfair square is one of the super hard games. Play the epic hard game. keep surviving though the incredible 10 hard levels. Many super challenging levels of this new hard game 2020 will make you crazy.

Unfair Square is a 2d platformer hardest game! Work your way through 10 epic hardest levels. Super challenging arcade, action game. Different obstacles to make your way hard. Full of infinite challenges, traps and obstacles. Use your abilities to avoid the obstacles and the traps. This game is meant to be hard!
Each level seems impossible but they are not if you're hardcore gamer!

Your major task in this new super hardest game 2020 is to reach at the end of the levels
by avoiding obstacles. be careful try not to touch any red obstacles and don't fall in the lava or you will die. this real hardest game is for everyone who like to play rage games or hard games. This game made with squares may provide you the feel of rage.

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump
